name: Mexican Halay Wave
description:
It is a 2D Platform Game with 8bit visuals and audio where you can control human wave to direct the ball and collect foods. Game created during Global Game Jam 2017.   Team: Asena Aksayım, İbrahim Hosceylan, Berk Yalcin, Emre Peynircioglu, Vugar Sevdimaliyev.

Controls:  Use mouse to control wave.
